title: Start
body:
<<avatar sign>> Press Z to interact with the tree critters üêúüêõüêû Spacebar to jump. 
And welcome to yarn's example GD project!

title: ant
body:
<<avatar ant>>Please don't bug me now... <<wait 1000>>  I am quite busy at the moment.
Have you seen my crumb?
[[ yes |antcrumbyes ]] [[ no |antcrumbno ]]

title: antcrumbyes
body:
<<if $seenCrumb == true>>
Oh yeah? You saw it on a branch?
Did you taste it?...
<<else>>
Oh ha-ha! I can see that you are lying.
<<endif>>

title: antcrumbno
body:
Then scram!
I don't have time for you...

title: crumb
body:
<<avatar crumb>> <<set $seenCrumb to true >> You stumbled on a giant crumb.
What would you like to do with it?
[[ taste it | eatCrumb]] [[ take it | takeCrumb]] [[ nothing | null ]]

title: eatCrumb
body: Let see <<wait 1000>>.<<wait 200>>.<<wait 200>> .<<wait 200>>these ü•® are making you thirsty...

title: takeCrumb
body: The thing is way too heavy üò¨ ....

title: doorroom1
body:
Enter DoorRoom1?.
[[ yes | enterdoorroom1 ]] [[ no | cancelenterdoorroom1 ]]

title: cancelenterdoorroom1
body: Maybe later.....

title: enterdoorroom1
body: <<enterDoorRoom1>>
